nodes.text: The Skywalker home was where the slaves Anakin Skywalker and his mother Shmi Skywalker Lars lived in Mos Espa on the desert planet Tatooine. By the time the handmaiden Sabé traveled to Tatooine on behalf of Padmé Amidala to free Shmi from slavery, Shmi no longer lived in the home and the door had a newly cut symbol of a white sun on it.
